import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent { public title = 'fluyt-site'; public navOpened: boolean = false; // const button = document.querySelector('button'); // const navItems = document.querySelector('nav'); // button.addEventListener('click', () => { // navItems.classList.toggle('hidden'); // }); public toggleMenu(): void { this.navOpened = !this.navOpened; } }
